action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Would it be possible to add one more thing in. Can we add one more box before the hot deals on the home page ‘EXCLUSIVE SAILINGS’ which then takes you straight to the exclusive sailing page?

Suzie


Best Regards,










Suzie Chami | Travel Consultant

Helloworld Travel Revesby
Ground Floor, Revesby Workers Club, 2B Brett Street

PO Box 629, Revesby NSW 2212


T: 02 9772 2066 F: 02 9772 2114

E: suzie.revesby@helloworld.com.au <mailto:suzie.revesby@helloworld.com.au>

: https://www.facebook.com/helloworldrevesby/ <https://www.facebook.com/helloworldrevesby/>
:https://www.instagram.com/helloworldtravelrevesby/ <https://www.instagram.com/helloworldtravelrevesby/>
ABN: 17108087430




Appointments are encouraged to ensure all our clients receive the best possible service.

Please don’t keep me a secret, your referrals are my greatest compliment. “Without a travel agent you're on your own”

I am available Monday to Friday 9:00am-5:30pm and Saturday by appointment.

Please don’t keep me a secret, your referrals are my greatest compliment. “Without a travel agent you're on your own”



<x-msg://12/helloworld.com.au/hsbc-book-now-pay-later>

WINNER 2018 "Outstanding Travel Agency"

For all passengers travelling overseas, ALL passports require 6 months validity from the return date back into Australia. Any queries please do not hesitate to contact me.

Travel insurance is strongly recommended by the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade for all overseas travel.
For up to date overseas travel information, we recommend you visit the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade (DFAT) website or call toll free on 1300 139 281.

Thanks heaps Heath! It’s really looking great.

I just went through the changes that were made and there are a few little things that need adjusting. It looks like the Price Custom Field has been disabled on the pages. Can you please turn this back on. Apparently we use this field for the Disney Cruise Line page and the Music Cruises page.

The land page for Disney should look like this:
The image is pulling through incorrectly
the blue writing should be in the Price Custom Field section

To: Amanda Marshall <amanda.revesby@helloworld.com.au <mailto:amanda.revesby@helloworld.com.au>>
Cc: Suzie Chami <suzie.revesby@helloworld.com.au <mailto:suzie.revesby@helloworld.com.au>>; Mark Knox <mark.knox3@bigpond.com <mailto:mark.knox3@bigpond.com>>
Subject: Re: Website changes

[THIS EMAIL IS FROM AN EXTERNAL SOURCE] DO NOT CLICK links or attachments unless you recognise the sender email address and know the content is safe.
Hi Amanda,

Thanks for sending these through. Confirming we have updated everything. The only one that’s not possible is:

————

Under Cruise Tools
Can you please add the header image that appears on the Frequently Asked questions page the following pages:
HSBC
Travel Insurance
Qantas Frequent Flyer

————

Reason being these are ‘posts' and the big header layout is only possible in the ‘pages’ items.

Also, regarding:

————
When we open the links under Hot Deals, Packaged Deals and Latest in Cruise the URL gocruising.com.au <https://aus01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fgocruising.com.au%2F&data=02%7C01%7Csuzie.revesby%40helloworld.com.au%7C74df7a509e7042df605308d823911fa3%7C2b657ceca6dd4a6d97c6c3480dac85bd%7C0%7C0%7C637298453519803927&sdata=XiYNAHDS6Vx6C5%2Fhr8SdT4VH%2BmoGyoauuqQtgi%2FD1eE%3D&reserved=0> shows etc.. Please update Do I need travel insurance to the following:
Absolutely! As an Australian, Medicare, New Zealand ACC and private health insurance will not cover you for any medical costs on board, all cruises (even cruises that do not visit foreign ports) require international travel insurance. We strongly recommend you organise your travel insurance at the time you pay your deposit.

You should not base your insurance decision on the assumption ‘it won’t happen to me’ – accidents or illness can happen to anyone. Daily hospital bills can cost more than AUD5000 per day.

For guests travelling to New Caledonia: New customs law states that every traveller visiting New Caledonia must be able to show a copy of their travel insurance certificate before entering the country. Guests without travel insurance may be denied boarding or entrance to New Caledonia.
